message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_INTERFACE_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: Factory class %1s for evidence type %2c does not implement the Evidence Interface.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_EVIDENCE2COMPARE_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: Factory class %1s for evidence type %2c does not implement the Evidence2Compare interface.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_NEW_INSTANCE_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: Factory class %1s for evidence type %2c does not implement newInstance method.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_INSTANTIATION_FAILED
message.locale: Exception instantiating evidence object for evidence type %1c : %2s.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_REGISTRAR_ISSUE
message.locale: Error using evidence entity registrar %1s .

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_CANNOT_DISCARD_PENDING_UPDATE
message.locale: Only records with a status of 'In Edit' can be discarded.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_CANNOT_UPDATE_ACTIVE_WHILE_RELATED_INEDIT
message.locale: Cannot modify this record as there is already a pending update outstanding for this record. Please make your changes to this pending update.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_CANNOT_MODIFY_INVALID_STATUS
message.locale: Only records with a status of 'Active' and 'In Edit' can be modified.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_REMOVE_AND_UPDATE_TO_SAME
message.locale: Cannot apply an update and remove to the same record (%1d).

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_NO_EVIDENCE_ROW_SELECTED
message.locale: No row has been selected, please select at least one row.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_VALIDATE_CHANGES_SUCCEEDED
message.locale: Validate changes was successful, no errors were reported.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_EVIDENCE_ATTRIBUTION_SUCCEEDED
message.locale: Evidence attribution was successful, no errors were reported.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_APPLY_CHANGES_WHERE_REMOVE_AND_UPDATE_SET
message.locale: The evidence record with correctionSetID %1s is both pending update and removal. You are advised to either undo the removal or discard with the update before continuing.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_APPLY_ALL_CHANGES_SUCCEEDED
message.locale: All evidence changes applied successfully, no errors were reported.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_APPLY_CHANGES_SUCCEEDED
message.locale: Selected evidence changes applied successfully, no errors were reported.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_APPLY_USER_CHANGES_SUCCEEDED
message.locale: Evidence changes applied successfully for %1s, no errors were reported.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_APPLY_USER_CHANGES_FAILED
message.locale: No evidence changes were applied.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_APPLY_USER_CHANGES_FAILED_DUE_TO_OUTSTANDING_MANUAL_APPROVALS
message.locale: No evidence changes were applied. There are changes that need to be manually approved before evidence can be applied successfully.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_CANNOT_DISCARD_EVIDENCE_AWAITING_APPROVAL
message.locale: Evidence that is currently awaiting approval cannot be discarded.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_CANNOT_DISCARD_PARTICIPANT_EVIDENCE_AWAITING_APPROVAL
message.locale: %1s has evidence that is currently awaiting approval and cannot be discarded.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_CANNOT_MODIFY_EVIDENCE_AWAITING_APPROVAL
message.locale: Evidence that is currently awaiting approval cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_RETRIEVE_EVIDENCE_FROM_DATE_BLANK
message.locale: A from date must be specified when retrieving evidence by date range.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_RETRIEVE_EVIDENCE_TO_DATE_BLANK
message.locale: A to date must be specified when retrieving evidence by date range.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_DISCARD_DUE_TO_PRESENT_CHILDREN
message.locale: This evidence record cannot be discarded as it has one or more dependent records.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_MORE_THAN_ONE_ACTIVE_PARENT_NOT_IN_SAME_SUCCESSION_SET
message.locale: More than one active parent, not in the same succession of changes, exists for this piece of evidence.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_PRODUCT_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the necessary product security rights to perform this action. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_CASE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the necessary case security rights to perform this action. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_CANNOT_MODIFY_EFFECTIVE_DATE_WHILE_INEDIT
message.locale: The effective date on this evidence record cannot be modified as it is 'In Edit'. The effective date can only be modified on 'Active' evidence.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_EFFECTIVE_DATE_BEFORE_BUSINESS_START_DATE
message.locale: The effective date cannot be before the evidence start date.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_EFFECTIVE_DATE_AFTER_BUSINESS_END_DATE
message.locale: The effective date cannot be after the evidence end date.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_CANT_APLY_PENDING_REMVOL_ALRDY_IN_PENDING_UPDATE
message.locale: Can not apply pending removal as there is already a pending update outstanding for this record. You are advised to discard with the update before continuing.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_CANT_UPDATE_ACTIVE_WHILE_ALRDY_IN_PENDING_REMVOL
message.locale: Can not modify as there is already a pending removal outstanding for this record. You are advised to undo with the pending removal before continuing.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_DUPLICATE_IN_EDIT_SAME_EFFECTIVE_DATE
message.locale: A work-in-progress record exists with the same effective date, please update the existing record.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_DUPLICATE_ACTIVE_SAME_EFFECTIVE_DATE
message.locale: An active record already exists effective from the date specified, applying this change will cause the original effective evidence to be superseded.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_RECIPIENT_CASE_NOT_CONFIGURED
message.locale: Case %1s has not being configured for some or all of the participant evidence being transferred to it.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_RECIPIENT_CASE_NOT_CONFIGURED_FOR_EVD_TYPE
message.locale: Case %1s, has not been configured to receive evidence of type %2s

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_PARTICIPANT_EVIDENCE_TRANSFERRED
message.locale: The participant evidence has been successfully transferred.

message.name: ERR_TRANSFER_EVIDENCE_SAME_CASE
message.locale: The case to which evidence is being transferred must not be the same as the originating case.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REMOVE_NOT_EXISTING_ASSOCIATION
message.locale: An association can not be removed as %1s record has no associations to other evidence.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONCONTROLLER_CLASS_COULD_NOT_BE_FOUND
message.locale: The VerificationController class cannot be found.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONCONTROLLER_CLASS_COULD_NOT_BE_INSTANTIATED
message.locale: The VerificationController class cannot be instantiated.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_SORTING_EVIDENCE_BY_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Sorting evidence by evidence description failed with the following error:

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_SORTING_ACTIVE_EVIDENCE_BY_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Sorting active evidence by evidence description failed with the following error:

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_EVIDENCE_ALREADY_IN_PENDING_REMOVAL
message.locale: Evidence cannot be removed as there is already a pending removal outstanding against this record.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_CASE_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED
message.locale: %1c case type not supported.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_DATA_ITEM_VALUE_NOT_SUPPORTED
message.locale: The data item value is not supported.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_TRANSFER_EVIDENCE_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: Evidence belonging to %1s from the %2c %3s will be transferred to %4c %5s. Do you still wish to transfer the evidence?

message.name: INF_LAST_ACTIVITY
message.locale: %1s on %2z

message.name: INF_LAST_ACTIVITY_PENDING_DELETION
message.locale: Pending Deletion by %1s on %2d

message.name: INF_LAST_ACTIVITY_APPLIED
message.locale: Applied by %1s on %2d

message.name: INF_LAST_ACTIVITY_IN_EDIT
message.locale: In Edit by %1s on %2d

message.name: INF_LAST_ACTIVITY_CREATED
message.locale: Created by %1s on %2d

message.name: INF_LAST_ACTIVITY_CANCELED
message.locale: Canceled by %1s on %2d
Cancelled by %1s on %2d

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_FV_TO_CASE_REFRENCE_NUMBER_ENTERED
message.locale: To Case Reference must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONTROLLER_FV_EVIDENCE_RECORD_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: An evidence record must be selected for transfer.

message.name: INF_INCOMING_EVIDENCE_INFORMATION
message.locale: There is incoming evidence on this case. Please review and decide if the evidence should be accepted or rejected.

message.name: INF_UNEVALUATED_EVIDENCE_INFORMATION
message.locale: Verifications have not yet been evaluated for some evidence on this case, refer the In-Edit evidence list to determine which evidence. Therefore there may be further verifications required for this case than currently listed here.
